afk.title: Standby mode
afk.description:
Switched to standby mode to reduce unnecessary data transmission.
Are you there? It's been more than {{afkTime}} minutes with no action detected!
afk.hint: Hover over this site to reconnect.

fetching.message: The system is synthesizing and retrieving data.

communication.cancel_request: Operation canceled due to new request.

info.paging_out_range: Your page number request has no data, showing the first page.

socket.title: Realtime Data Issue

sth_wrong.action: Something went wrong. Please try again later!

not_found.description: Page you are trying to open does not exist. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL. If you think this is an error contact support.

validation.password: Password must contain at least 8 characters
